languages.text: "Итак, шерин, что же мы имеем: трусливого ашмага, желающего заполучить мою грамоту без особых усилий. Учитывая... обстоятельства, с которыми столкнулся Футфол, единственным подходящим местом для логова такого отброса являются канализационные тоннели". {n}Джай морщится лишь от одних воспоминаний.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Итак, шерин, что же мы имеем: трусливого ашмага, желающего заполучить мою грамоту без особых усилий. Учитывая... обстоятельства, с которыми столкнулся Футфол, единственным подходящим местом для логова такого отброса являются канализационные тоннели". {n}Джай морщится лишь от одних воспоминаний.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Well, shereen, what do we have here? A cowardly ashmag who wants to get his paws on my certificate without even working up a sweat. Considering the... circumstances currently affecting Footfall, the only fitting place this filth could be hiding is in the sewers." {n}Jae's nose wrinkles at the very thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Well, shereen, what do we have here? A cowardly ashmag who wants to get his paws on my certificate without even working up a sweat. Considering the... circumstances currently affecting Footfall, the only fitting place this filth could be hiding is in the sewers." {n}Jae's nose wrinkles at the very thought.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「それで、シャリーン、ここには何があるの？汗もかかずにあたしの証明書を手に入れようとする卑劣なアッシュマグさん。今、フットフォールに影響を与えている状況を考慮すると…この汚物が隠れるのに適した唯一の場所は下水道よ」{n}その場所のことを思うだけで、ジェイの鼻にしわが寄る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well, shereen, what do we have here? A cowardly ashmag who wants to get his paws on my certificate without even working up a sweat. Considering the... circumstances currently affecting Footfall, the only fitting place this filth could be hiding is in the sewers." {n}Jae's nose wrinkles at the very thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それで、シャリーン、ここには何があるの？汗もかかずにあたしの証明書を手に入れようとする卑劣なアッシュマグさん。今、フットフォールに影響を与えている状況を考慮すると…この汚物が隠れるのに適した唯一の場所は下水道よ」{n}その場所のことを思うだけで、ジェイの鼻にしわが寄る。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “好了，亲爱的，看看是什么人挡在我们面前？他是个懦弱的坏种，打算不费吹灰之力就弄到我的执照。考虑到……落脚港目前的情况，这个肮脏的无赖唯一合适的藏身之处，就是下水道了。”{n}一想到这个，婕伊的鼻子便皱了起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well, shereen, what do we have here? A cowardly ashmag who wants to get his paws on my certificate without even working up a sweat. Considering the... circumstances currently affecting Footfall, the only fitting place this filth could be hiding is in the sewers." {n}Jae's nose wrinkles at the very thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “好了，亲爱的，看看是什么人挡在我们面前？他是个懦弱的坏家伙，打算不费吹灰之力就弄到我的执照。考虑到……落脚港目前的情况，这个肮脏的无赖唯一合适的藏身之处，就是下水道了。”{n}一想到这个，婕伊的鼻子便皱了起来。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Bueno, bueno, shereen, ¿qué tenemos aquí? Un ashmag que quiere hincarle el diente a mi certificado sin esforzarse lo más mínimo. Teniendo en cuenta las... circunstancias que asolan actualmente Paso, el único lugar en que se escondería un gallina como él serían las alcantarillas». {n}La nariz de Jae se arruga solo de pensarlo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well, shereen, what do we have here? A cowardly ashmag who wants to get his paws on my certificate without even working up a sweat. Considering the... circumstances currently affecting Footfall, the only fitting place this filth could be hiding is in the sewers." {n}Jae's nose wrinkles at the very thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, bueno, shereen, ¿qué tenemos aquí? Un ashmag que quiere hincarle el diente a mi certificado sin esforzarse lo más mínimo. Teniendo en cuenta las... circunstancias que asolan actualmente Paso, el único lugar en que se escondería un gallina como él serían las alcantarillas». {n}La nariz de Jae se arruga solo de pensarlo.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Eh bien, qu'est-ce qu'on a là, shereen ? Un misérable ashmag qui pense pouvoir mettre ses sales pattes sur mon certificat sans bouger le petit doigt ? Vu les... circonstances dans lesquelles Castel se trouve actuellement, je dirais que l'endroit le plus approprié pour lui, ce sont les égouts. » {n}La simple évocation du lieu lui fait froncer le nez de dégoût.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well, shereen, what do we have here? A cowardly ashmag who wants to get his paws on my certificate without even working up a sweat. Considering the... circumstances currently affecting Footfall, the only fitting place this filth could be hiding is in the sewers." {n}Jae's nose wrinkles at the very thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, qu'est-ce qu'on a là, shereen ? Un misérable ashmag qui pense pouvoir mettre ses sales pattes sur mon certificat sans bouger le petit doigt ? Vu les... circonstances dans lesquelles Castel se trouve actuellement, je dirais que l'endroit le plus approprié pour lui, ce sont les égouts. » {n}La simple évocation du lieu lui fait froncer le nez de dégoût.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Nun, Shereen, was haben wir hier? Einen feigen Ashmag, der mein Zertifikat in die Pfoten kriegen will, ohne dafür ins Schwitzen zu geraten. Angesichts der aktuellen ... Umstände auf Footfall ist das einzig passende Versteck für dieses Dreckstück die Kanalisation." {n}Schon beim Gedanken daran rümpft Jae die Nase.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well, shereen, what do we have here? A cowardly ashmag who wants to get his paws on my certificate without even working up a sweat. Considering the... circumstances currently affecting Footfall, the only fitting place this filth could be hiding is in the sewers." {n}Jae's nose wrinkles at the very thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nun, Shereen, was haben wir hier? Einen feigen Ashmag, der mein Zertifikat in die Pfoten kriegen will, ohne dafür ins Schwitzen zu geraten. Angesichts der aktuellen ... Umstände auf Footfall ist das einzig passende Versteck für dieses Dreckstück die Kanalisation." {n}Schon beim Gedanken daran rümpft Jae die Nase.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Kimler varmış burada böyle şirinim? Ödlek külboğazın teki, havadan tasdiknameme konmak istermiş. Binliman'daki mevcut vaziyeti düşünürsek o rezilin saklanabileceği tek yer kanalizasyondur." {n}Kanalizasyon düşüncesi bile Jae'ın yüzünü ekşitmeye yetiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well, shereen, what do we have here? A cowardly ashmag who wants to get his paws on my certificate without even working up a sweat. Considering the... circumstances currently affecting Footfall, the only fitting place this filth could be hiding is in the sewers." {n}Jae's nose wrinkles at the very thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kimler varmış burada böyle şirinim? Ödlek külboğazın teki, havadan tasdiknameme konmak istermiş. Binliman'ın... Mevcut vaziyetini de düşünürsek o rezilin saklanabileceği tek yer kanalizasyondur." {n}Kanalizasyon düşüncesi bile Jae'ın yüzünü ekşitiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
